name: Dead Mayhem
description: One day the world suddenly changed due to an outbreak of the zombie virus! Build a safe area and teach yourself how to survive!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 3337U Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 4690 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 750Ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
